alert.note: Alert for Eastern Culberson County; Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 2:43AM CDT until April 22 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains, and Northern Lea County. In Texas, Loving and Eastern Culberson Counties, and Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor and Reeves County Plains. * WHEN...From 1 PM CDT /noon MDT/ to 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Culberson County; Loving; Reeves County Plains; Van Horn and Highway 54 Corridor
